headline: XOP Beats The Odds And Climbs 17.1% Despite Oil Stuck Below $65
summary: The SPDR S&P Oil & Gas Exploration & Production ETF (NYSEARCA:XOP) tracks a basket of U.S. energy producers at a pivotal moment for the sector. As of February 13, 2026, the fund trades at $147.89, delivering a 17.1% year-to-date gain despite persistent commodity headwinds. This resilience reflects the portfolio’s diversification across upstream producers, even as ... XOP Beats The Odds And Climbs 17.1% Despite Oil Stuck Below $65
